subtitles:
44900 48320 People once believed
that when someone dies...

48400 52700 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

52780 56120 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

56200 61450 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

61540 64580 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

64670 69670 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
115340 119350 There's a piece of glass.

123930 128440 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

128520 131770 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

135360 139320 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

139410 141660 All right, guys,
let's do it.

141740 144950 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

146460 149290 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

149380 154260 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

157220 160550 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

160640 165430 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

165520 167810 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

167850 170730 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

170810 173400 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

173480 176940 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

177030 180030 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
180110 182030 All right, clear out.

183410 186000 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

188250 192460 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

192540 194750 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

194840 198760 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

208770 211600 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

211690 215730 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

215780 219070 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
219110 221450 She's my friend.
221530 225450 Her and Eric.
225490 227750 You lied to her about Eric.

229500 233210 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

233290 235630 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

244680 250390 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
250520 253940 She's gonna be fine.

272830 276880 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

276960 279840 I used to think that was true
about everything...
279920 284340 families, friends, feelings.

284390 288350 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

288390 292770 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

331020 334230 What are you,
like the night watchman?

355540 358920 You know, what this place
needs is a...
359000 361340 good natural catastrophe.

361420 365840 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

365880 368890 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
368970 371260 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
371350 374390 Hey, hey, let me do it.

374480 378520 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

378560 381020 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

381070 383030 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
383070 385490 Hey, all right.
385570 387950 Now we're talking.
388030 392740 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

392830 396660 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

396750 400670 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

400750 402550 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

402630 406300 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
406380 409590 They make you fart big time.

415930 418640 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

418730 421360 from all the crap
floating around in it.
422520 426280 I wish I could have seen that.
486590 491090 Fire it up! Yeah!

530210 534140 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

557120 560490 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T- bird, cop car, cop car.

567750 570340 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

576390 578300 - Damn it!
- What was that?

578390 581060 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
581140 584440 Mickey, call it in for me!

678360 681450 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

681530 686040 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
686120 688330 Place looks fine to me.
688370 691210 Let's redecorate.
693710 697880 "Abash, the devil stood...

697920 700630 and felt how awful
goodness is.

700720 705310 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
718440 721200 No, no, no, me first.

769000 771910 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

775790 779380 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

779460 781380 Look at that.
Look at that.

782720 787180 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

790850 792850 You go over there
and talk to your pals...
792890 796020 You sick fuck.

796060 799780 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
803030 807410 Look at that!
809620 811660 Pussies drink last, man.

812910 815330 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.

816750 819250 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
819340 821510 This one is.

821590 824510 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...

824590 828890 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

828970 832850 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

832930 836020 - Fire it up! - Fire
it up! - Fire it up!
836100 838900 Fire it up! Fire it up!
838980 842070 Here's your shooters.

842150 844110 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

879520 883030 - I love you.
- Say that again.
888700 892120 Restaurant.

896790 899960 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

907010 909590 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

1007730 1010280 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

1010360 1014370 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
1014450 1016780 Leather purse. Leather.
1016870 1021370 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1021460 1026000 A blood stain
that's on here?

1026090 1028710 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

1028800 1031630 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
1031720 1034470 Right there for ya.
1034550 1038930 Decisions, decisions.
1040470 1043640 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1043730 1046730 ...child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.

1046770 1049150 Close the gate
when you go out!

1049230 1051900 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1054570 1057990 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1062710 1067170 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1172230 1175360 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1177950 1182200 Halloween ain't till manana.
1224200 1227620 Fuck, you murderer!

1227700 1230330 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1230410 1234500 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1234590 1238010 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1238050 1240630 - You're out of your fucking mind...
- Listen!

1240720 1245550 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1245640 1250600 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1250640 1253100 Her name was Shelly.

1253190 1256190 You cut her.
You raped her.

1256270 1262070 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1271290 1276210 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1276290 1280920 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1285640 1288180 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1288260 1290930 We never miss.

1301530 1303610 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1308700 1313540 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1338270 1342610 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.

1349990 1352750 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1357500 1360800 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1361920 1363840 Give me some of that
over there!

1366090 1369800 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1369850 1374640 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1374680 1378520 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1378600 1382820 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1382860 1386950 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1416980 1420770 You're thinking
about the past.
1423070 1425570 Dad gave me this.
1425650 1429820 Fifth birthday.

1429910 1434580 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1448470 1450930 Is she asleep?
1457140 1459390 I think we broke her.
1463400 1465520 I love her eyes.

1485130 1488300 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1506900 1512450 I told you to stay out of here.

1512490 1516160 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1516240 1520290 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1520330 1522670 I don't have any dolls.
1522750 1526130 Get some food, huh?

1526170 1529170 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1534890 1538560 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1548570 1551820 Thirty, forty dollars.
1553570 1556030 Who the fuck is this now?

1556070 1560240 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1563080 1566920 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1574510 1578760 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1586440 1590820 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1590860 1594820 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1596780 1599080 What are you talking about?
1599160 1601870 You heard me rapping, right?

1601950 1606080 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1608500 1611460 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1613010 1615340 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1619600 1624730 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1624810 1627350 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1635820 1638070 You're not paying attention.

1643240 1648540 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1650170 1653630 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1656340 1660010 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1665310 1667310 Who's this sack of shit?

1667390 1670350 That's Tin Tin, one of
T- bird's little helpers.

1670440 1673480 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1673570 1676360 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1676440 1680610 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1680700 1685410 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1685490 1687410 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1687500 1691250 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1692460 1694880 What the hell
do you call that?
1695920 1698510 I call it blood, detective.

1698590 1702390 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1702430 1705220 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1711940 1714860 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1714940 1717570 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1717610 1720530 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1720610 1724990 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1725080 1730580 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1734170 1736750 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1753650 1757860 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1781760 1784680 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1784760 1787850 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1787930 1790770 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1790850 1793480 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1793560 1795940 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1796020 1801110 T- birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1801190 1804200 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1804280 1808030 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1808120 1810870 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1810950 1813620 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1815290 1818670 Each one of these is a life...
1818750 1821260 a life you helped destroy.

1821340 1823970 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1824010 1827720 I'm not gonna kill you.

1827800 1831970 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1840610 1844820 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1846700 1850790 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1850870 1854500 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1854580 1856710 Is that gasoline I smell?

1878940 1882400 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1882480 1884780 One root beer.
1886780 1889530 I can't do anything.

1889620 1894080 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1900880 1905800 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1905840 1908880 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1908970 1912890 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1912970 1918140 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1918190 1921520 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1921560 1925940 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1926030 1929160 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1931030 1934200 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1934290 1938290 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1938370 1941040 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1941080 1945710 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1945760 1950590 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1950680 1955140 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1955220 1957640 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1957730 1962310 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1962400 1964980 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1965070 1968570 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1968650 1973990 - He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1974080 1977750 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1977830 1980250 Get away from there!

1980330 1983460 Cops!
Get outta here!
1992300 1996640 Oh, great, great.

1996720 1999310 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1999390 2001690 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2001770 2007610 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

2007690 2011610 Little early
for Devil's Night.
2013200 2015910 You are very restless.

2015990 2019200 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2019290 2023540 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2035010 2038060 There are energies
aligning against you.

2038140 2040600 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

2059740 2063710 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2063790 2067000 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2067080 2068840 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2068920 2071590 You must be
awfully disappointed.

2071670 2075010 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2075050 2077350 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2077430 2082020 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2082060 2084640 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2084730 2087900 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2090570 2093150 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2093240 2096030 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2096070 2098910 That's very reassuring.

2098950 2103000 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2103080 2107540 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2107630 2109460 Call it my need to know.
2143080 2145660 Let go, you creep!

2150840 2154130 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2155550 2157930 He couldn't have stopped.

2158010 2162300 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2162390 2165430 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2169560 2174320 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2175480 2178990 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2195920 2200510 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2200590 2204930 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2205010 2208430 Annie... look at that.

2208520 2212730 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments... "
2212810 2214860 What is this, a petition?

2214940 2217820 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2217900 2221990 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighborhood?

2222070 2227950 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2228040 2231580 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2231670 2235670 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2242680 2246430 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2248680 2253440 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2253480 2255980 Ah, I owe you one!

2285760 2289640 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2289720 2293390 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2318290 2320920 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2327090 2329720 Come here, bird.

2329810 2331890 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2331970 2334310 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2334350 2336980 Here, birdie, birdie.

2337020 2340020 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2342650 2345860 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2350870 2352830 What the fuck?

2359210 2363760 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2366050 2368930 Don't sweat it.

2370640 2373680 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2381610 2386450 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2388450 2393370 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2393450 2396960 You need professional help.
2401420 2404050 He shoots! He scores!

2414180 2417890 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2417980 2420690 Stop me if you heard this one.

2420770 2423690 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2429110 2431870 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2431950 2435490 Don't you ever fucking die?
2435580 2437830 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2443340 2447920 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2450130 2454220 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2478450 2480460 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2483500 2486210 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2503980 2507860 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2519580 2524080 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2524170 2528920 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2539350 2544150 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2573920 2577600 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2577680 2579930 Now fill it up!
2581020 2584390 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2584480 2587150 I really need this.

2595740 2599700 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2599740 2602330 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2602410 2604870 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2604960 2607880 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2607960 2610750 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2614340 2617260 Hey, good night, Darla.
2619680 2623390 You stay put right there.
2631440 2634900 Get away, steamhead.

2666060 2671810 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2671860 2674610 - the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2674690 2677650 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2677740 2680700 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2680740 2682910 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2682990 2685120 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2685200 2689960 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2693040 2696550 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2700550 2702720 Good likeness.

2702800 2706520 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2706600 2708850 You still have your hat on.
2712770 2714860 I gotta sit down.
2724700 2729000 are you some kind of... ghost?

2738630 2743180 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2745180 2749270 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2749350 2752440 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2752520 2757110 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2757190 2759820 Come on. Read the file.

2759900 2764240 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2764320 2767540 Her body finally just gave it up.

2767580 2771460 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2781340 2783260 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2795980 2799280 I saw her
through your eyes.

2799360 2801440 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2801530 2806990 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2807070 2811830 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2811870 2814830 Give me something
I could work with.

2819670 2822170 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2822260 2825590 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2825680 2829140 would talk after
what happened to you?

2829220 2832430 I kept asking
questions and...

2832520 2835190 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2839190 2841150 This your wife?

2841230 2845700 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2850580 2854580 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2854660 2858170 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2858250 2861250 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2870890 2875350 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2880020 2883230 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2886860 2889570 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2892620 2898460 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2909550 2913060 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2913140 2916270 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2916350 2919400 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2919480 2922730 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2922770 2925320 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2925400 2929820 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2929910 2934910 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2934990 2937460 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2937540 2940040 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2940120 2945630 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2945710 2948470 You ain't lost everything.

2948550 2953640 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2953720 2957310 Fair enough. Catch.

2960940 2963360 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2963440 2965440 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2965480 2969150 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2969240 2973200 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2973280 2977410 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2980210 2985380 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2985460 2988710 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?
